item.title: @elonmusk: You can‚Äôt make it up. The FCC will vote on requiring that federal subsidies flow only to people that...
item.description: You can‚Äôt make it up. The FCC will vote on requiring that federal subsidies flow only to people that are both living and lawful beneficiaries. Dems oppose.

item.title: @elonmusk: This is incredible‚Ä¶ Billionaire Chamath Palihapitiya, once a MEGA Donor to the Democrat Party, says ...
item.description: This is incredible‚Ä¶ Billionaire Chamath Palihapitiya, once a MEGA Donor to the Democrat Party, says he was totally brainwashed by the NYT, WSJ, CNN, CNBC, MSNBC, CBS etc‚Ä¶ and he believed every lie about President Trump as soon as he came down the escalator ‚ÄúOver the course of 6 or 7 years, I realized that some of those fundamental things that I was told about him was totally false‚Ä¶ and it started with the Charlottesville lie ‚Äî then I started to go down that rabbit hole.‚Äù Cliprumble.com/v74ztte-billionai‚Ä¶Katie Miller Podcastxcancel.com/katiemillerpod/status/‚Ä¶

item.title: @elonmusk: Grok Imagine is so advanced you don‚Äôt even need to write a prompt Just upload an image - it analyzes...
item.description: Grok Imagine is so advanced you don‚Äôt even need to write a prompt Just upload an image - it analyzes the visual, infers intent, completes the prompt, and generates the video, voice, and relevant narration automatically At most, you just type a simple prompt

item.title: @elonmusk: Imagine is crushing it right now, hands down the best out there. With the new 10s generations as wel...
item.description: Imagine is crushing it right now, hands down the best out there. With the new 10s generations as well, it's especially amazing. I've been generating all images and videos in there now, no need to go anywhere else.

item.title: @elonmusk: Congrats to the@Neuralinkteam for helping many people who have lost use of their body with our Telep...
item.description: Congrats to the@Neuralinkteam for helping many people who have lost use of their body with our Telepathy implant that enables computer use simply by thinking! The next generation Neuralink cybernetic augment with 3X capability will be ready later this year. Pending regulatory approval, we are also ready to do our first Blindsight augment that will enable those who have even complete loss of vision to see in low resolution at first, leading to high resolution over time.
